coreAttributes.name: God of destruction Power
coreAttributes.description: Gain the strength and destructive abilities of Gods of destruction. You are now able to deal a massive amount of damage and manipulate KI.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(put)] on the glove and [npc.verb(feel)] a divine power surging!
coreAttributes.unequipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(drop)] [npc.her] glove and [npc.verb(notice)] the difference in power.
